import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { AccountService } from '../_services/account.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { // model: any = {}; // loggedIn = false; // constructor(private accountService: AccountService) {} // login() { // this.accountService.login(this.model).subscribe({ // next: (response) => { // console.log(response); // this.loggedIn = true; // }, // error: (error) => console.log(error), // }); // } // logout() { // this.loggedIn = false; // } }
